CustomField.formula: IF( AcctSeed__Account__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Dealer' , 'Partner', IF( AcctSeed__Account__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PersonAccount', 'Retail', IF( AcctSeed__Account__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Business_Account', 'Retail', IF( AND( AcctSeed__Account__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Supplier', RecordType.Name = 'Retail Boat Sale'), 'Retail', null))))
CustomField.label: Sale Type
